bibl.title: An Elongated Composite Stone Anchor from Matariya.
bibl.note: SCA Matariya [site of ancient Heliopolis] Reg. Number 216. Hard limestone, length: 76 cm, weight: around 80 kg. Found in 1985 in a Roman period sandy layer.

bibl.title: Alexandria under the Mediterranean. Archaeological Studies in Memory of Honor Frost

bibl.seg: Mohamed Mostafa Abd el-Maguid, An Elongated Composite Stone Anchor from Matariya.
Georges Soukiassian (ed.), Alexandria under the Mediterranean. Archaeological Studies in Memory of Honor Frost = Études Alexandrines. 36 (Alexandrie, 2015) pp. 125-136, 14 figg. n./bl. et coul.
SCA Matariya [site of ancient Heliopolis] Reg. Number 216. Hard limestone, length: 76 cm, weight: around 80 kg. Found in 1985 in a Roman period sandy layer.
